name: Queerskins: ark
storyline: A devoutly Catholic mother reconnects with her son, Sebastian, through his diary and her imagination. Envisioning a scene from Sebastian's diary, she imagines him alive and in love.
summary: Queerskins: ARK is a 6DoF interactive virtual reality experience. Reading a diary left by the estranged son, a Catholic mother finds a way to transcend herself and her grief by imagining him alive and in love. Ark allows you to enter her imagination and co-create the lovers' intimate dance through your body position and movements.
